entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening and ending before morning then 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow or rain beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
